title: Film Festival deadline is today!
content:
Nowâ€™s your last chance to get films in for Typophile Film Festival #2, which will debut at TypeCon NYC this summer! Send your submission URLs to [typophile@punchcut.com](mailto:typophile@punchcut.com).

For full details, see [http://typophile.com/filmfest](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329204228/http:/typophile.com/filmfest)
author: Jared Benson : 17 June, 2005 - 11:20am
